settings.title: Are you living with a chronic illness?
settings.text: Apply in 2 minutes and get 35% off.

settings.title: Want to support but don’t have an illness?
settings.text: Buy a bottle, and we’ll donate a bottle.

settings.title: Chronic Illnesses Have Been Invisible
settings.subtitle: We’re changing that. Buoy sees, hears, and supports you.

settings.title: Sugar
settings.subtitle: Found in: Gatorade, Liquid IV, Nuun
settings.text: Not only does sugar cause inflammation and disease, it can also make you more dehydrated. Sugar intake can work against electrolyte function.

settings.title: Inefficient Form Factors
settings.text: Not only does sugar cause inflammation and disease, it can also make you more dehydrated. Sugar intake can work against electrolyte function.

settings.title: Invest in You with 35% off
settings.text:
Staying hydrated is one of the first things a healthcare professional recommends for chronic illness management.

Buoy offers a clean, effective, and easy-to-use alternative to the other electrolyte companies out there. We say no to:
Multiple Sclerosis (MS) and other autoimmune disorders

settings.subtitle: “This mom feels better…”
settings.testimonial: My daughter was recently diagnosed with POTS - she was taking four, 1L bottles of electrolyte water to school each day trying to hydrate enough to keep her blood volume up. I stumbled upon Buoy and ordered some for her to try. She now takes one water bottle to school, refills it at the fountain, and adds Buoy for the electrolytes! When she needs an extra boost, she squeezes Buoy directly into a Gatorade - it’s SO easy to use Buoy in everything!
settings.author: Michelle A

settings.right_title: DISCOUNTS AVAILABLE FOR ALL CHRONIC ILLNESSES

settings.title: We donate to nonprofits
settings.text: We donate a bottle for every bottle sold on our website to a verified 501(c)3 nonprofit supporting chronic illness communities. If you don’t have an illness, you can still support those who do.

settings.title: It’s time for people with chronic illnesses To Be Seen
settings.text: Buoy’s first campaign shines a light on the real faces of creators upending chronic illness culture and how they won’t let an illness swallow their identities.
settings.text2: For summer ’22, we’re only investing in creators with chronic conditions. These talented creators are often tokenized, unpaid and under-represented. It’s time for this community To Be Seen.
